title: One Kiss
lyrics: Let me take the night, I love real easy And I know that you'll still wanna see me On the Sunday morning, music real loud Let me love you while the moon is still out Something in you lit up heaven in me The feeling won't let me sleep 'Cause I'm lost in the way you move, the way you feel One kiss is all it takes Fallin' in love with me Possibilities I look like all you need One kiss is all it takes Fallin' in love with me Possibilities I look like all you need One One One One I just wanna feel your skin on mine Feel your eyes do the explo ring Passion in the message when you smile Take my time See a wonder land in your eyes Might need your company tonight
